You will be responsible for applying new approaches and technologies to solving business problems and presenting insights from ground-breaking statistical models of complex challenges to colleagues throughout the company.
In this position, you will help internal clients leverage large amounts of disparate data sources to solve their toughest problems and arrive at data-driven answers with greater speed and accuracy.
You will also work with our Global Key Account team, and selected clients, to develop insights that are used to answer their most pressing business questions.
As part of the Global Insight Center of Excellence you will
Work closely and collaborate with internal and external teams across the business to provide more focus, visibility and action based on consumer, customer and market data

Help develop the roadmap for implementing high-performing predictive models and creative analyses to address global business objectives

Facilitate new 2nd party/3rd party data integrations partnerships to on-board new data into our data lake
Identify ways to improve existing capability, or add new capabilities to our portfolio of marketing technologies through working with our Global digital IT teams, as well as other 3rd parties

A Bachelor s degree in Data Science or related quantitative fields (statistics, operations research, mathematics, econometrics etc.).

Deep and varied technical experience in delivering statistical analytics, data science and insight on large-scale data sets across multiple sectors, mainly in the food beverage sector
Demonstrated examples of creating data visualization and analytical tools to interpret customer demographics, geographic distributions, and competitive benchmarking.
Able to partner effectively with the business stakeholders so they embrace your contribution, value your team s contribution and partner to ensure the insights create value.

Description:
• About Medline:
Medline is America's largest privately held national manufacturer and distributor of health care supplies and services. Today, Medline manufactures and distributes more than 550,000 medical products, encompassing medical-surgical items and one of the largest textile lines in the industry. With 17 manufacturing facilities worldwide and over 25 joint venture manufacturing plants worldwide, along with 45 distribution centers in North America and 50 throughout the world, Medline posted $ 13.9 billion revenue last year. Medline is ranked #27 in Forbes 2019 list of Americas private companies.

Medline Industries India Pvt. Ltd. is engaged in providing offshore business support services to Medline Industries Inc. & its global associate companies in the area of Information Services, Finance & Business processes Management. Medline Industries India Private Limited was setup in 2010 in Pune, India and today we are proud team of 700 plus associates supporting Medline’s healthcare vision across USA, Europe & other International regions.

Why join Medline:

A direct, full-time employment in a large, stable, rapidly growing and yet profitable company.
Privately owned company with no public debts.
No ill effects of recent downturn/recession.
First-rate compensation and benefits package.
Genuine individual growth potential in this new establishment.
Open door and highly ethical work culture, with due accountability.

Job Description:

Medline is continuing to expand our operations in Pune and is looking for a Data Analyst who is capable of performing data analysis and reporting. The goal of this job is to ensure accuracy of the data analysis and ensure timely reports in proper manner.

Some of the roles and responsibilities :

Cross verify and update data in Logistics systems .
Inbound coordinators, scheduling appointments and working rush receiving.
Inventory control coordinators, resolving issues and doing research.
Follow defined process & check reports to identify action items .
Identify workflow processing errors and take corrective actions .
Identify trends and report to Vendor EDI Support for correction.
Reconcile Invoice adjustments .
Other duties as assigned.
Office timings from 10:30/ 11:30 am to 7:30/8:30 pm IST.

Required Skills:

At least 2 years experience in providing offshore based data maintenance and analysis services for US/ International clients.
End user experience on any major Enterprise application system (SAP will be preferred).
Mid-level MS Excel skills (including sorting, filtering, pivot table).
Critical & Analytical thinking .
Strong English written and oral communication skills. The team members will have to interact daily with the US teams on Tasks.
Self-driven work ethic: ability to work independently and proactively.
Proven capability of consistently completing allocated tasks before deadlines and as per requirements.

Preferred Skills:

Work experience in Logistics/ Shipping/ Transportation/ Warehousing domains.
Skills in Math & Statistics.

Educational Qualification:

Any Graduate / Post Graduate degree
Preferred: BE, BSC, MBA with specialization in Maths/ Statistics/ Operations

Work Experience:

2-4 years of relevant experience.

Description:
As a Senior Data Aanlyst in Pune you can help make possibilities happen.

JOB SUMMARY:
Uses predictive modeling, statistics, trend analysis, and other data analysis techniques to collect, explore, and identify the right data to be analyzed from internal and external sources, uses data to explain or predict customer behavior and solve a variety of business problems. Finds patterns and relationships in data. Builds predictive models using data, tests the model on results outside of the sample size and verifies the model in the real world. Must possess strong understanding of internal business segment (stakeholders) and may require presentation and influencing skills.

DIMENSIONS:
Standard work environment
Travel required, may be domestic or international

JOB ACCOUNTABILITIES:
Understand and Adhere to all Corporate Policies to include but not limited to ACI Code of Ethics and Global Information Security.
Develops and maintains operational metrics. Provides daily, weekly and monthly reporting from tools (case management tool, etc.). Creates and maintains metric definitions. Works with other internal departments to ensure consistent use of metrics.
Analyzes operational performance for improvement. Proves pre-development consulting services with internal customers to gather and define development environment requirements for projects and enhancements to existing systems.
Works with management to develop new management tools/metrics. Reviews, analyzes and evaluates system performance for process improvement initiatives.
Provides support for changes to system tools (case management tool, etc.) to improve efficiency and effectiveness of staff. Maintains environment specific support materials.
Perform other duties as assigned.
MINIMUM JOB QUALIFICATIONS:
Bachelors Degree in Statistics or Computer Science or equivalent work experience.
2 years of related experience.
Typically requires experience in relational database structures, research methods, sampling techniques, and system testing.

Benefits:  In return for your expertise, we offer growth, opportunity, and a competitive compensation and benefits package in a casual work environment.

Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a seasoned data analyst to own the following responsibilities:
Understanding the technology domain especially the role of various technologies.
Mapping the business use case to a data solution.
Working with varied data formats like JSON, CSV, XML, HTML, etc to extract information for the business case.
Predominantly implementing Python-based tools, scripts, and code on Linux in a cloud- based environment.
Analyze results using statistical techniques and provide reports using SQL, Python, Athena, ElasticSearch, etc
To be a great fit for our team, you:
Must have 5-8 years of experience in handling data
Must have the ability to interpret large amounts of data and to multi-task
Must have strong knowledge of and experience with programming (Python), Linux/Bash scripting, databases(SQL, etc)
Must have strong analytical and critical thinking to resolve business problems using data and tech
Must have domain familiarity and interest of Cloud technologies (GCP/Azure Microsoft/ AWS Amazon), open-source technologies, Enterprise technologies
Must have the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.
Must have good communication skills
Qualifications
Few goods to have qualities, we are looking for in you:
Good to have exposure to Agile methodology, training team members, leading team
Good to have knowledge in Reporting Tool (Tableau/Power BI/Looker) and generating data insights
Working knowledge/exposure to ElasticSearch, PostgreSQL, Athena, PrestoDB, Jupyter Notebook

Description:
Job Summary:
We are looking to add a Senior Data Quality Analyst to our Data Platform team to help deliver data quality monitoring and delivery platform. An ideal candidate will have solid skills in data analysis tools such as SQL, Python, data visualization (Tableau, Grafana, others). The
candidate should also have excellent communication skills to partner with various crossfunctional teams to understand requirements, validate and deploy quickly.
Quicken is a nationally recognized brand with a large active customer base. We are working towards an exciting future where our customers are able to access and manage their financial lives anywhere, anytime, and on any device. This is an opportunity to work in a customer-driven company with a collaborative team that values technical excellence, innovation, and creativity while being good to each other and having fun!
Responsibilities:
Work with cross-functional, cross-geographical teams such as engineering, product management, finance, marketing to deploy data quality across critical pipelines on the data platform.
Work with source system owners, product managers, subject matter experts and developers to build a firm understanding of source data and outline data quality requirements.
Setup processes to triage and resolve data quality issues.
Create and drive data quality standards and frameworks to be included in engineering efforts.
Create metrics and ongoing reporting functions to measure and monitor data quality for most critical data assets.
Communicatehighlight any data discrepancies with stakeholders and explain possible business implications.
Investigate and evaluate new technologies and products for application within the data quality environment.
Apply defined data quality best practices and procedures to design, influence, and drive quality.
Actively participate in establishing project plans, estimating work and monitoring progress against milestones.
Assist scrum master with the development of the team s backlog in JIRA and assist with regularly scheduled grooming sessions and work closely with developers to support the Agile development process.
Qualifications:
Graduate+ in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, Business, Engineering or equivalent work experience.
Total experience of 8+ years with at least 3 years in managing data quality for high scale data platforms.
Good knowledge of SQL querying.
Strong skill in analyzing data and uncovering patterns using SQL or Python.
Excellent understanding of data warehousebig data concepts such as data extraction, data transformation, data loading (ETL process).
Strong background in BI and data visualization leveraging open source librariespackages and third-party tools (Tableau or similar).
Experience in big data technologies a big plus.
Experience in machine learning, especially in data quality applications a big plus.
Experience in building data quality automation frameworks a big plus.
Strong experience working with an Agile development team with rapid iterations.
Very strong verbal and written communication, and presentation skills.
Ability to quickly understand business rules.
Ability to work well with others in a geographically distributed team.
Keen observation skills to analyze data, highly detail-oriented.
Excellent judgment, critical thinking, and decision-making skills; can balance attention to detail with swift execution.
Able to identify stakeholders, build relationships, and influence others to get work done.
Self-directed and self-motivated individual who takes complete ownership of the product and its outcome.

RoleQuality Assurance/Quality Control Executive

Functional AreaIT Software - Application Programming, Maintenance
Employment TypeFull Time, Permanent
Role CategoryQA/Testing/Documentation

Description:
Roles and Responsibilities

Job Description:
Specific responsibilities include:
• You should have good hands-on experience in designing, implementing, and operating stable,
scalable, solutions to flow data from production systems into analytical data platform (big data
tech stack + MPP) and into end-user facing applications for both real-time and batch use cases
• You should be able to work with business customers in a fast paced environment
understanding the business requirements and implementing analytical solutions.
• You should have good experience in the design, creation, management, and business use of
large datasets
• Do high level design with guidance; Functional modelling, break-down of a module
• Thinking platforms & reuse
• Build and execute data modeling projects across multiple tech stacks i.e. big data, MPP, OLAP using agile development techniques
• Challenge status quo and propose innovative ways to process, model, consume data when it
comes to tech stack choices or design principles
• Build and integrate robust data processing pipelines for enterprise-level business analytics.
• Strong engineering mindset - build automated monitoring, alerting, self healing
(restartability/graceful failures) features while building the consumption pipelines
• Translate business requirements into technical specification
(fact/dimension/filters/derivations/aggregations)
• As needed, assist other staff with reporting, debugging data accuracy issues and other related
functions.
• An ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills to be able to work with engineering,
product and business owners to develop and define key business questions and to build data
sets that answer those questions.
• Above all, you should bring your passion for working with huge data sets and bringing datasets
together to answer business questions and drive change
Desired Competencies and Skill sets include:
• 3-5 years’ experience with Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Technology
or related field required
• 2 to 3 years of relevant software development experience with sound skills in database
modeling (relational, multi-dimensional) & optimization and data architecture - databases e.g.
Vertica
• Good understanding of streaming technologies like Kafka, Spark Streaming.
• Experience with Enterprise Business Intelligence Platform/Data platform sizing, tuning,
optimization and system landscape integration in large-scale, enterprise deployments.
• Proficiency in one of the programming language preferably Java, Scala or Python
• Good knowledge of Agile, SDLC/CICD practices and tools
• Must have proven experience with Hadoop, Mapreduce, Hive, Spark, Scala programming.
Must have in-depth knowledge of performance tuning/optimizing data processing jobs,
debugging time consuming jobs.
• Proven experience in development of conceptual, logical, and physical data models for
Hadoop, relational, EDW (enterprise data warehouse) and OLAP database solutions.
• Good understanding of distributed systems
• Experience working extensively in multi-petabyte DW environment
Skills Required :
Hadoop, Mapreduce, Hive, Spark, Scala programming. Must have in-depth knowledge of performance tuning/optimizing data processing jobs, debugging time consuming jobs.

Description:
Data Analysts

Job Position Details

Experience: 2- 3 yrs

Minimum Skills

Strong business analytics skills

Proficiency in Excel

Intermediate to Advanced skills in SQL and R Studio/Python

Understanding of Statistics and basic modelling skill

Excellent interpersonal skills

Understanding of ecommerce domain would be an added advantage

About CE team

The Customer Experience team represents the voice of Myntra's customers. This team has an enterprise wide vision and works with all functions (Supply Chain, Category, Technology, Contact Center, Marketing & Revenue, Operations, and Cataloging etc) to ensure sustained performance across every leg of the customer journey. This entails strong cross functional understanding and stakeholder management to drive immediate action and process changes.

More importantly, the team defines the long term strategy that drive step change growth in customer experience. These are initiatives and investments that will create a world class standard for online fashion and lifestyle consumption experience for Myntra customers (e.g. Try & Buy, Next Day Delivery, Alterations, Product Quality, Forward & Reverse Logistics Experience), while improving customer metrics that influence long term business growth (Engagement, Retention, Life Time Value, Advocacy) and differentiating Myntra from the competition.

The team is comprised of a strong mix of analytical storytellers who turn data into actions. It also owns the customer experience index and is entrusted with providing the organization real time consumer insights. To that end, it relies on diverse capabilities including a strong analytics team, VOC Analysis, Market Research Cell, Customer Immersion Program and a store front lab.

Job Description and responsibilities

Strong data analytics to identify top issues at a macro/micro level

Strong analytical thinking to study performance trends and take decision for revised goal settings, changing processes where required to mitigate root causes for the issues identified

Ability to coordinate and work with peers across departments to arrive and achieve cumulative goals, plan corrective actions in close coordination

Strong process orientation and knowledge

Independent - Ability to function with no/minimum supervision

Ability to learn quickly

Description:
Job Tiltle:- Data Quality Analyst

Level -Senior Business Analyst/ Assistant Manager

Basic Function

The Data Quality Consultant is responsible for design, development, and implementation of data quality solutions. This position will contribute to the implementation methodologies and best practices and work on project teams to analyze, design, develop and deploy data quality solutions to support a variety of customer needs.

Essential Functions

(45%) Assist design, develop, test, and deploy data quality processes using tools such as Informatica, Trillium, Oracle, SAP, etc.

(20%) Collaborate with business users to identify attributes that require data quality and corresponding business rules. Profile data, analyze user requirements, and translate & apply business rules to data quality rules.

(20%) Create functional & technical documents - e.g. data quality architecture flows, data profiling results, data quality specifications, test plans

(10%) Contributes to corporate data management best practices and implementation methodologies

(5%) Other duties as requested or assigned


Required Candidate profile
Skills:

Technical Skills:

- Can effectively utilize SQL and/or available BI tool to validate/define business rules.

- Demonstrates understanding and competency with approaches/methodologies for at least one EDM area and applies this knowledge in collaborating with the team to design effective solutions to solve business problems/issues.

- Produces high-quality results and deliverables that meet client needs.

- Demonstrates a complete understanding of and utilizes DSC methodology documents to efficiently complete assigned roles and associated tasks.

- Independently drafts complete detail documentation templates (i.e., Design Specs, Test Plans, etc.) that have a professional appearance for review by managers.

- Deals effectively with all team members and builds strong working relationships/rapport with them.

- Demonstrates ability to organize tasks and time necessary to complete assigned tasks/deliverables.

- Demonstrates ability to motivate team members and assist them in meeting their goals and commitments

Education Requirements

- Bachelor's degree

Work Experience Requirements

- Overall experience of 3-5 years with strong database background

- 2-3 years- experience with a data quality tool such as Informatica, Trillium, Oracle, SAP, etc.

- Bachelor Degree or equivalent experience

- Experience in data profiling and data quality analysis preferred

- Strong understanding of data quality best practices and concepts

- Strong data and SQL skills required

Key Responsibilities: Perform detailed data analysis to understand data propagation through our systems/applications and document/code the data transformation rules/logic. Participate in Requirement Analysis discussions to understand and document data requirements. Perform data profiling and analyze results to identify data quality issues. Identify master sources for data sets and ensure data is provisioned from these master sources only.
Document metadata of data sets, interfaces, datastores and databases using standard enterprise metadata management tools. At adidas we have a winning culture. But to win, physical power is not enough. Just like athletes our employees need mental strength in their game. We foster the athlete s mindset through a set of behaviors that we want to enable and develop in our people and that are at the core of our unique company culture the 3Cs: CONFIDENCE, COLLABORATION and CREATIVITY.
CONFIDENCE allows athletes to make quick decisions on the field, to reach higher. For us at adidas confidence means acknowledging that we don t have all the answers. But we are willing to take risks, we try new things. And if we fail, then this is part of our learning it helps us improve.
COLLABORATION . Every elite athlete relies on partners: coaches, teammates, and nutritionists. We, too, know that we are stronger together. Winning as one team takes open and candid dialogue, inclusiveness and trust in each other s abilities and talents.
Being the best sports company in the world takes CREATIVITY . No great athlete succeeds by copying their predecessors training plans and strategies. We have to be open to new ideas, explore, gain an edge and stand out. Only then can we succeed.

Research, plan, recommend and implement dashboards and data visualization in Tableau to meet the organization's business requirements

Excellent analytical abilities: Data driven and understanding of key analytical techniques

About 10FA India Private Limited:
10FA India Private Limited ( formerly known as Prudential Global Services ) is M&G plcs global capability center located in Mumbai. M&G plc is a FTSE 100 company with a 170+ years of legacy which is in the international savings and investments business, serving around 5.5 million retail customers and more than 800 institutional clients. Description:
We?re looking for a data analyst who is excited about applying their analytical and engineering skills to democratize data, metrics and insights driven decision making for all Zscaler employees. If you are naturally data curious, excited about both deriving insights from data and designing data pipelines to improve availability and usability of those insights, and motivated by having impact on the business, we want to hear from you.
Responsibilities :
Enable improved business decisions by providing visibility to pricing performance, insights into business drivers and pricing recommendations to support business objectives
Accelerate analytics maturity through efficient data management and dashboard development to enable higher value predictive analytics
Create and enhance pricing models to support price optimization, competitive analysis and financial scenarios
Develop and automate pricing performance reporting to understand pricing profitability, discounting trends, pricing competitiveness and pricing effectiveness
Develop business expertise and familiarity with business needs through strong cross-functional partnerships and business relationship development
Provide ad-hoc pricing and business analysis to support leadership and cross-functional pricing inquiries
Work closely with the Pricing team, the Finance & Strategy team responsible for driving financial insight, pricing and deal strategy at Zscaler, and to identify important questions and answer them with data
Design, build and update data pipelines to improve availability and usability of Pricing data and insights in Snowflake and Tableau
Automate reporting and visualization of Pricing metrics in Tableau
Partner with Pricing and Systems teams to develop deal pricing tools
Provide operational support for pricing initiatives
Design, analyze, and interpret the results of pricing experiments
Apply models on large datasets to measure results and outcomes
Requirements :
3 to 6 Years of experience in a Business Intelligence Engineering, Data Engineering, Data Analyst and/or Data Science role, with a focus on building data pipelines and/or analyzing large data sets to solve problems
Master?s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Management, or a related technical field
Expert knowledge of SQL and visualization using Tableau.
Create analyses that tell a ?story? focused on insights, not just data
Knowledge of a scientific computing language (such as R or Python)
Prior experience in Finance or Pricing at a leading technology company, or experience within investment banking, management consulting or venture capital
Strong knowledge of statistics and experimental design.
Entrepreneurial spirit that thrives in a fast-paced environment, deals well with ambiguity and focuses on driving impact.
Proven ability to work cross-functionally, building and maintaining trust with internal stakeholders.
High attention to detail including precise and effective communications.
Hyper focus on and intuition for understanding the underlying needs of the business.

Responsibilities and Scope Impact / Scope
Collaborate with finance teams   to drive high quality Finance Master Data through   Data Structures , and timely   resolution of system issues

Manage   training and mentoring   of team

Responsibilities
Responsible for the maintenance and implementation of Finance Master Data Structures authoring and mastering data in both NetSuite (ERP) and Informatica (MDM) applications at both an operational and corporate level.
Business Stakeholder Management including peers, juniors and senior management across financial process areas, to ensure all financial attributes are correctly stated and managed throughout the appropriate data models within reporting.
Ensure Informatica system provides accurate, reliable and on-time financial Data Mappings ensuring that all reporting applications (reliant on this data) can be completed throughout the month end close and any data queries are resolved in a timely manner, ensuring business communications throughout
Provide support for resolution of complex system issues related to data integrations, latency and data modelling
Create Master Data elements in ERP (NetSuite) and manage integrations with MDM and downstream applications.
Support Reporting delivery teams with complex reporting / Data analytics and BI using the company Corporate Framework as a date model point
Review and ensure that testing and validation of Finance Master Data for releases, enhancements, process changes, etc. is done in a timely manner
Collecting and approving business data requirements as part of the financial year-end rollover, for additions to the data model or data reporting, working with the BI and Reporting delivery teams to align on expectations and deliverables.
Includes data modelling and process optimization to suit the business requirements working with FP&A on version models of financial data.
Stakeholder management in terms of expectations and delivery
Perform data validations on Finance Master Data across applications to ensure consistency of data attributes throughout the Author, Master and Subscriber Application matrix
Approve access to Informatica for Finance data as required.
Reviewing and approving the monthly user base reconciliations and ensuring that all users with corporate access align to the company policy on data security and insider information.
Ensuring detailed knowledge of the security framework in place for the data report builds and database access
Provide system support to delivery teams during process / system stabilization
Managing the Service Delivery Portal for all new Master Data requests, working closely with the lead to ensure all relevant approvals have been obtained
Logging and triaging all first line responses on tickets relevant to master data
Requesting approvals for create, update and suspend request
Manage ticket closures and stakeholder management
Lead the implementation of new corporate-wide Finance Master Data processes / systems (including development, implementation, maintenance, and communication procedures) and support new projects / transitions.
Ensuring and maintaining a detailed business and application knowledge in respect of the financial master data from an end to end perspective from input to reporting.
Understand and acknowledge the company strategy in terms of developments in master data.
Ensuring all master data changes are compliant with relevant legalization and local requirements (SOX / GDPR)
Report the KPIs / SLA?s to the management / employees (Ad-hoc and MIS Reporting) and deliver Service Management Framework
Ensure performance measures are met or exceeded in order to drive performance and process efficiencies
Be proactive and innovative with ideas to improve service based on current performance and risk understanding
Review existing applications and processes for any gaps or solution opportunities that will drive business and performance enrichment and efficiencies.
Protect organisation's value by keeping information confidential
Engaging with CDO on technical architecture and support model of Informatica.

Engagement on Finance Master Data integrations supporting the data flow between reporting layers
Ensure knowledge and expertise is maintained, developed and exchanged within the team (including cross-training within the team)

Excellent communication skills; ability to clearly articulate expectations and outcomes with various levels of management, both in Finance and Business

Description:
As a Game Analyst you will be thinking of potential improvements to our growing portfolio of games. By predicting the potential gains, as well as Analysing the final results, the role is to ensure our games are in the best state possible for driving revenue.

You'll be part of a team that will be based in the new office that we're going to open in Bangalore
What you tell your friends you do
My analysis keeps Kwalee games at the top of the charts for longer!
What you will really be doing
Analyse how millions of players interact with our ever expanding portfolio of games, from prototype to global launch, in order to measure and predict, performance, trends and relationships.
Use statistical testing and predictive modelling to recommend changes to in-game features and design.
Manage large amounts of data from a multitude of sources in order to fuel your activities.
Regularly communicate results and identify solutions with development, management and data science teams.
How you will be doing this
You ll be part of an agile, multidisciplinary and creative team and work closely with them to coordinate efforts and get the best results.
You ll think creatively and will be motivated by challenges and constantly striving for the best.
You ll work with cutting edge technology, if you need software or hardware to get the job done efficiently, you can get it. We even have a robot!
Skills and requirements
Experience analysing complex and varied data in a commercial or academic setting.
Desire to solve new and complex problems every day.
Excellent ability to communicate scientific results to both technical and non-technical team members.
Desirable
A degree in a numerically focussed discipline such as, Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Engineering or Biological Sciences.
Experience with any programmatic analysis tools/languages such as Python, C++, MatLab, R.
Experience with SQL or NoSQL databases for the purposes of data retrieval and management.

Description:
ESSENTIAL DUTIES:

Demonstrate strong information management, data quality, data analytics, and architecture skills including a strong working knowledge of data infrastructure and various technology reporting platforms.

Provide leadership, motivation and establish a teamwork environment for the cross functional data quality team and processes; and advises, influences and coaches other team members in the development and achievement of data quality program goals.

Play a key role in leading the development, documentation, and implementation of data quality procedures and standards to support enterprise data management (EDM).

Work with business partners, data management stakeholders and the IT departments to define and document data quality rules, targets, and standards.

Establish change controls over quality standards and work with functional and IT partners to enforce within organization.

Work with IT resources to turn business quality rules into technical requirements and manage / coordinate business testing and certification activities with data stewards and owners.

Partner with data stewards and owners to implement, enhance, and manage governance dashboarding capability on quality metrics.

Define user experience standards and exception reporting capability.

Partner with IT to implement data quality mart and data quality trend reporting.

Implement and manage training and education in the data quality space with users to ensure use and adoption of data quality tools and processes to improve quality of data.

Facilitate and provide data quality subject matter expertise within the organization working groups focused on data quality improvement efforts.

Oversee the development and implementation of detailed project and work plans for data quality monitoring and reporting efforts within the organization.

Coordinate the planning, documenting and execution activities for the projects; along with tasks, budgets, timelines, and project staffing to successfully complete projects on a timely basis and within budget.

Develop documentation to support the project planning and implementation process.

Lead and provide support to project teams by facilitating/attending project meetings, documenting minutes and action items, responding to assigned tasks when due.

Provide recommendations for measuring and improving the effectiveness and efficiency of operational control processes, and data compliance activities.

Support proactive profiling, data lineage reviewing, performing root cause triage, and support identifying appropriate owners for fixing root causes of the issues.

Develop and refine high quality monthly and quarterly metrics reporting and publishing capability demonstrating program activities and communication to stakeholders senior leadership.

QUALIFICATIONS:

A Bachelor s degree with a minimum of 4 years of experience in data quality / governance related work or similar.

4 years of experience in a technology organization/Saas subscription based model preferred.

Strong SQL and relational database / data warehouse (SAP, Oracle, SQL Server) skills, data analysis experience is needed to be successful in this role. Techno-functional individual with strong business acumen is required. Experience with reporting tools like SAP Business Objects, Tableau, Power BI etc. is desired.

Exposure to data quality tools like SAP Information Steward, Informatica Data Quality is desired.

Knowledge of industry leading data quality and issue management tools and practices.

Knowledge of data related government regulatory requirements and emerging trends and issues.

Strong knowledge and experience in data related activities (data quality, data governance, metadata, data management, data standards, data structures, data aggregation, and business requirement).

Strong written and verbal communication skills with ability to speak to varying levels across the organization.

Development and championing of cross-functional engagement within data governance and to other business / IT groups.

Ability to get to the heart of the problem and make sound and timely decisions to resolve problems.

Ability to connect data / metrics to business impact metrics and results.

Description:
Job Description :

About the role :

Give someone a reason to apply for this job or to work with this company! Think about what people who are good at this job enjoy the most about their work.

1. For some, the opportunity to build a new team is an appealing factor

2. For some, the opportunity to learn new technologies or skills is an appealing factor

3. For some, the experience of selling our products and services is critical to their next career move

What you will accomplish :

- Lead a team of data scientists engaged in many areas of data science including deep learning, machine learning, text modeling, time-series forecasting, anomaly detection, and advanced complex models

- Apply statistics and advanced modeling to solve data science problems

- Build predictive data science solutions using text analysis

- Build AI and machine learning solutions that operate at scale in production environments

- Research, prove and document new modeling approaches and cutting-edge algorithms

- Refactor complex SQL programs for speed and efficiency

- Collaborate the Atlanta Data Science team in automating models and building Python solutions from existing R, SQL, and other platforms

- Work up to 90 days a year in the U.S. office.

Desirable Candidate Profile
Skills and experiences that will make you successful

- Skills :

1. Proven ability to lead and influence strategic and tactical business decisions based on advanced statistical and quantitative modeling

2. Knowledge of advanced statistical modeling, testing, data mining, and data science techniques

3. Advanced in modeling frameworks including Scikit-learn, PyTorch, and TensorFlow

4. Highly proficient in Python and SQL

5. Proficiency in Linux working in shell

6. Experience in R is a plus

7. Experience with H2O, Data Robot or other automated AI tools are a plus

8. Advanced Excel and PowerPoint skills required

9. Experience with Tableau and other data visualization is a plus

10. Strong scientific approach to problem-solving

- Communication and Cognitive Skills

1. Highly proficient in English

2. Ability to adjust and adapt to different audiences

3. Proactive problem-solving capabilities

4. Entrepreneurial and team-oriented spirit

- Experience

1. Doctor's degree in Statistics, Engineering, Decision Sciences, or similar field required

2. 6+ years of relevant experience in Data Science with 3 years- experience in management.

3. 1 - 2 years working in the U.S.

4. Experience with developing machine learning models and successfully automating scaling them for corporate-wide usage.

5. Experience in building a new team a plus.

Description:
If you are ready for an exciting career YOU would be responsible for the following.
Azure Senior Data Engineer is accountable for developing and delivering cloud-based data solutions across the enterprise which includes both Consumer & Customer and Value Chain super personas. The functional areas include Supply Chain, R&D, Digital Marketing, Commercial Excellence.
This is very hands-on development role which includes developing & delivering code through from origin to production, plus working in partnership with 3rd party development service providers to help ensure that code comes in on time, to quality and in line with the overall ecosystem being established.
Development: Hands on, sleeves up development and delivery expected as a matter of course.
Delivery: Ensure project goals are achieved on time in alignment with the stakeholders expectation. Ability to work on complex projects and in a distributed environment. Escalate to other Data & Analytics leadership team when needing support. Work in close collaboration with other team members in the CH BI Tech team, to ensure Development/Delivery/BAU aspects are well represented in the project s requirements and deliverables.
Methodology: Incorporate agile ways of working into the delivery process thru use of DABL (Discovery, Alpha, Beta, Launch) framework to show value periodically. Individuals will work as part of product-centric delivery team(s) that will focus on delivering value independently while fully embracing integrated DevOps approaches.
Ownership: Take ownership for the delivery/development projects and help steer until completion.
Partnering: Work when required with external and/or internal delivery agents to coordinate delivery.
Governance: Follow governance that allows projects and stakeholders to manage overall project performance and manage programme risks within the global nature of some of the programmes.
Forward looking: Remain flexible towards technology approaches to ensure that the best advantage is being taken of new technologies. Keep abreast of industry developments in analytics and be able to interpret how these would impact services and present new opportunities.
Quality, Risk & Compliance: Ensure all risk and issues associated with owned projects are recorded and managed in the appropriate Risk & Issue logs in a timely manner. Ensure all Risks and Issues have clear action/mitigation/contingency plans defined, with named action owners and timelines for completion.
Technical Architecture: Be conversant with technical architecture to contribute to design discussions in partnership with the Delivery/Development Director and dedicated Analytics & Data Architect.
Taking on the role of DevOps champion to define and implement the analysis, execution, and streamlining of DevOps practices.
We are looking for professionals with these skills to achieve our goals. If YOU have these skills, we would like to speak to you.
8-10 years as a senior Developer in the Data & Analytics arena with demonstrated expertise in emerging technologies and data technology platforms and management.
MS/BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Design or equivalent experience.
Fully conversant with agile and DevOps development methodology and concepts. Must have worked in CI/CD ways of working using tools like Azure DevOps.
Fully conversant with big-data processing approaches and schema-on-read methodologies are a must and knowledge of Azure Data Factory/DataBricks/Azure Data Lake/Azure DW/Analysis Services is a must.
Experience of the Azure analytics components, Power BI, Power Apps & Microsoft Visual Studio is desirable.
Good to have an excellent development skills & extensive hand-on development & coding experience in a variety of languages, e.g. C#, Python, SQL, DAX, etc.
Being conversant with and qualified in Data Science and Machine Learning approaches will put you at a significant advantage and position you well to deliver on the future pipeline of work.
Experience in executing Data Analytics projects in an Agile manner, articulation of Value depending on the project life cycle stage, Creating MVPs, developing plans for scale up are all very important experience to be successful in this role.

Join us as we work to create a thriving ecosystem that delivers accessible, high-quality, and sustainable healthcare for all.
We are looking for a Senior Data Analyst to join our Platform Operations team within our Product Optimization division. Your job will be to work collaboratively in an Agile environment with subject matter experts to document functionality in online help and functionality changes aimed at internal athenahealth developers and external partners who use athenahealth SaaS based services on every bi-weekly and tri-annual releases, meeting hard deadlines. Additionally, you will be responsible for managing content across multiple teams and platforms. But enough about us; let’s talk about you.
You are action-oriented, displaying a can-do attitude and enthusiasm. You ensure accountability by communicating the status and completion of assignments. You are resourceful and able to juggle various priorities and workplace demands. You can quickly grasp the essence of new issues and concepts and ask questions to learn from others’ experience. You are an excellent communicator with an ability to maintain poise and a sense of humor in a fast-paced environment with immovable deadlines. As a diplomat, you can work effectively with a wide array of personality types and all job levels. You demonstrate the ability to write clearly, simply, and accurately. You are a consummate team player with dedication to client service.

Description:
Roles and Responsibilities
The DLP Analysis position is assigned to Loancare Information Security Office. The primary purpose of this position is responsible for initial analysis, monitoring, and escalation of security events detected from email & web DLP dashboards and data protection controls. DLP Analyst will understand various forms of threat as required and defined by Loancare Information security including security breaches, restricted and sensitive data in emails, intellectual property theft, insider trading, fraud and avoidance of security controls. DLP Analyst may work with FNF Enterprise Information Security team with leading edge tools and processes and subject matter expertise.
The Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Analyst must be able to build strong relationships with all levels of the company and interface with internal and external contacts in a professional manner as well as interact with business key stack holders to fulfill the responsibilities and obligation
Desired Candidate Profile
Monitor alerts generated from the DLP systems and other technologies

Description:
This Senior Data Engineer will need to have a successful history of data analysis, design, implementation and production deployment in critical, multi-business environments. This role will work closely with various Digital Product Insights, Analytics, Intelligence, Operations and Support teams in a highly collaborative environment to ensure that all types of data is securely collected, structured, and made accessible to support analytics, reporting, and insight generation. This data engineer will need to have strong experiences with Data Analysis, ETL, Data Warehousing, Data Architecture, Data Modeling, SQL, RDBMS and Big Data engineering. This data engineer is expected to design, implement, deploy, and support automated data pipes from various source systems to one or more target systems. Beyond technical capabilities this role will need to take diverse and changing requirements and turn them into actionable plans and deliver within a timely manner and within budget. The ideal candidate will have had experience in the high paced, high-energy startups as well as experience in the structured world of larger companies. The ideal candidate will also have experience applying Agile methodologies to the SDLC process.

Essential Functions:

Review business requirements with project teams to propose and produce technical documentation such as dataarchitecture, data modeling, data dictionary, source to target mapping with transformation rules, ETL data flow design, and test cases.

Discover, explore, analyze and document data from all source and target systems to better understand the total scope of Data Availability at JPMC.

Participate in the Agile development process to develop automated data pipes.

Optimize queries, data aggregations, and data pipes and improve data models in order to optimize and improve data delivery performance.

Collaborate with Operations, Platform, and DBAs teams to test and deploy implementations into Production and provide Production support as needed.

Collaborate with other data engineers to provide development coverage, support, and knowledge sharing and mentoring of junior team members.

Escalate issues and concerns as needed.



8 years of experience working in a technical environment as an engineer or developer.

5 years of hands-on experience with data architecture, data modeling, database design and data warehousing.

5 years of hands-on experience an ETL tool like Pentaho, DataStage, Informatica, or Ab Initio.

5 years of hands-on experience with SQL development and query performance optimization.

5 years of hands-on experience with data mining and data analysis.

5 years of hands-on experience with unix shell scripting, Perl, and Python. Scala is a plus.

5 years of hands-on experience with traditional RDBMS such as Oracle, DB2, MS SQL and/or PostgresSQL.

2 years of hands-on experience working with Hadoop Hive, Sqoop, HDFS, and Control-M.

Experience with Agile (Scrum) methodologies.

Excellent critical thinking, verbal and written communications skills.

Strong estimating, planning and time management skills.

Strong understanding of Big Data and open source technologies.

Ability and desire to thrive in a proactive, highly engaging, high-pressure, customer service environment.
Qualifications

Bachelor's in Computer Science/Engineering, Statistics, Math, Physics, related quantitative degree or equivalent work experience.

Must have a passion for Data, structured or unstructured.
Additional Information
All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

Bachelor's in Computer Science/ Engineering, Statistics, Math, Physics, related quantitative degree or equivalent work experience.

Must have a passion for Data, structured or unstructured.

Description:
At Pearson, we re committed to a world that s always learning and to our talented team who makes it all possible. From bringing lectures vividly to life to turning textbooks into laptop lessons, we are always re - examining the way people learn best, whether it s one child in our own backyard or an education community across the globe. We are bold thinkers and standout innovators who motivate each other to explore new frontiers in an environment that supports and inspires us to always be better. By pushing the boundaries of technology and each other to surpass these boundaries we create seeds of learning that become the catalyst for the world s innovations, personal and global, large and small.
Job Description - Data Engineer
Overall Experience: 2 - 4 years
Job Responsibilities
Design, develop, and deploy data solutions for Big Data/BI projects for Pearson Global Product
Design, develop, and deploy data integrations, reporting with cloud based database technologies, and ETL (e.g., Talend for Big Data)processes
Understand and cloud - based data technologies to build out a scalable yet simple and fast Data Ecosystem infrastructure
Design and develop web - based visualizations and other data analysis solutions for data analysts and business users
Develop, maintain, and optimize the Data Ecosystem through the entire data lifecycle, from data modeling to consumer output
Understand, validate, and refine business requirements by collaborating with product management and business stakeholders
Develop in - depth understanding of underlying data, data structures, and business use cases to ensure data delivery meets business needs for an industry leader in education
Author and modify simple and complex SQL queries for standard and ad - hoc reporting needs
Review and modify queries and database structures using database optimization techniques, indexing, and query optimization for efficient performance of data solutions
Debug, monitor, and troubleshoot data solutions and fix root cause of issues
Develop and execute unit tests for individual modules within data solutions
Collaborate with QA engineers to develop and automate system and data testing
Contribute to an ongoing, system - wide effort to maintain well defined, high quality, predictable data which conforms to Pearson data models and data capture standards
Collaborate with internal application teams to continuously improve the Data Ecosystem
Maintain an accurate and useful Data Dictionary, and promote its use by system stakeholders
Work effectively in a fast - paced, Agile development environment
Mentor junior Data Engineering team members on a daily basis and provide guidance and assistance in members career development
Job Requirements
Education
Ideal candidate must possess at least a 4 - year Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent. Relevant prior experience in software development can be demonstrated in the absence of a computer science major.
Experience
Minimum of two years in a Data Engineer role with a background in data technologies/business intelligence/data warehousing and experience in designing and developing data solutions within a large - scale environment
Required Skills
Relational DBMSs
Very good knowledge of SQL querying
Rich experience in relational data modeling
Good work experience in writing complex queries and stored procedures
Good knowledge in query performance tuning
Strong skills and work experience with relational database like Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, MySql, etc., and ability to work with multiple sources and formats of data
Ability to carry out monitoring, tuning, and database performance analysis.
Experience in developing logical,physical and conceptual data models.
Dimensional Data Modeling
Good work experience in developing data models and data warehouses
Experience in designing and developing dimensional models for a business process
ETL Engineering
Good knowledge in designing and implementing ETL procedures to intake data from internal and outside sources, as well as ensuring data is verified and quality is checked
Experience in developing ETL solutions for Big Data integrations
Good experience in integrating data from relational data sources (Oracle, MSSQL, MySql)
Hands on experience in integrating data from object - based data sources (MongoDB, Cassandra, DynamoDb)
Experience in integrating data from flat files
Experience in integrating data from JSON structures
Experience in optimizing ETL jobs and workflows
Experience in working with ETL job scheduling tools
Desired Skills
Working knowledge of Big Data / cloud - based / columnar databases (such as Hbase, MongoDB, AWS Redshift, etc.)
Experience in scripting languages like Python, Ruby, Perl, etc.
Experience in ETL tools like SSIS, Talend, Pentaho, etc., is a plus
Experience with version control systems such as Git
Ability to recommend improvements to organisation s standards, methods, and procedures
Ability to participate and encourage continuous improvement within the program and share experiences across programs
Ability to collaborate with Global business stakeholders directly when required to understand requirements and discuss solutions

Description:
Senior Analyst , Data ScienceWhen everything's connected , how we connect is everything and we'd like to connect with you too! We are looking for you to help us deliver exceptional customer experiences as a Senior Analyst , Data Science.

At TTEC , we help global brands provide a great experience to their customers , build customer loyalty , and grow their business. We were founded on one guiding principle: customer experiences that are simple , inspired , and more human deliver lasting value for everyone. Your role brings that principle to life.

TTEC , a 50 , 000 employee , global customer experience pioneer , is opening a new information technology and data science center of excellence in Hyderabad where you'll have the opportunity to get in on the groundfloor of this expansion.

In this role , the Data Scientist will support the development of consulting products as well as work on consulting engagements. This person will leverage a range of data science techniques as well as support the introduction and advancement of decision science throughout our client engagements in his or her role as a subject matter expert. This person will design , manage and deliver client analyses and have extensive experience in coding in SAS or Open Source Statistical Programming software like R and Python.

The successful candidate will be able to evaluate large amounts of consumer data and cull out key insights to support data - driven marketing , voice - of - the - customer (VoC) and customer experience (CX) programs.



What you'll be doing

Utilize statistical methods including mix modeling , predictive response modeling , sales response modeling , experimental design , CART / CHAID , latent class segmentations , cross - sectional and time series analysis , discrete choice modeling , data mining and optimization techniques to meet client business needs

Develop and implement statistical tools to build predictive models helping support clients in customer marketing and demand generation initiatives

Collaborate with internal consulting teams to set analytic objectives , approach and work plans

Provide programming and analytic support to internal consulting or related teams , writing macros and automating statistical procedures utilizing SAS and Microsoft Office

Perform unstructured analysis to carry out sentiment classification , topic and theme detection to uncover actionable customer insights

Utilize speech tools to identify , create and track category indexes on large volumes of speech data

Perform analytics utilizing SAS , or R as well as extract data using SQL or Python

Build dashboards in Tableau , Power BI and other visualization software / packages

Translate analytical model results to business insights for the client

Develop and test machine learning algorithms applied to targeting , recommendations , behavioral analytics , etc. on Big Data

Work closely to productize the algorithms to address real world data

What you'll need to be successful

Position requires a Master's or foreign equivalent degree in Applied Statistics , Mathematics , or Economics

1+ year experience providing programming and analytic support to internal consulting or related teams , writing macros and automating statistical procedures utilizing SAS and Microsoft Office

Experience performing analytics utilizing SAS , R or Python

Experience working on predictive algorithms on Big Data

Hands - on experience building systems with machine learning techniques , such as logistic regression , Na ve Bayes , SVM , decision trees , neural networks , and random forests

Experience using open source machine learning toolsets e.g. Weka , R , Python etc.

Experience in working with product teams to deliver machine - learning algorithms for real world problems

Client and project management skills

Strong verbal and written communication skills

Comfortable working in team - oriented , deadline driven environment

Proficiency with Excel and PowerPoint , working knowledge of unstructured data analysis tools , and Business Intelligence (BI) tools a plus

Passion and ability to quickly learn new technologies

TTEC Values

Lead Everyday Do the Right Thing Reach for Amazing Seek First to Understand Act as One Live life Passionately

companies: Doctors Without Borders India Private Limited
skills:
Key Skills
CData ManagementData CollectionMS OfficeClinical TrialsICH-GCPData QualityQCExcelClinical ResearchData VerificationClinical Data ManagementQuality Assurance
Description:
Vacancy: DATA ANALYST ACTIVITY MANAGER / INTERNAL MONITOR
No. of Vacancies - 1
Doctors Without Borders India
Doctors Without Borders/ Medecins Sans Frontieres (MSF) is an
international, independent, medical humanitarian organisation that delivers
emergency aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, natural and man-
made disasters and exclusion from healthcare in more than 70 countries. DWB
offers assistance to people in need and irrespective of race, religion, gender or
political affiliation.
Doctors Without Borders has worked in India since 1999, providingfree-of-charge
essential healthcare to people in remote areas; treatment and care for people
affected by HIV/AIDS, malnutrition; hepatitis C, tuberculosis, kala azar and sexual
and gender-based violence; an important subject for our action is containing
effect of antibiotic resistance. We also respond to natural disasters and other
emergencies, provides mental healthcare and advocates for the development of
more effective and affordable medicines to improve access to treatment
everywhere.
without Borders was awarded the Indira Gandhi Prize forPeace,Disarmamentand
Development in 1996 and the Nobel Peace Prize in 1999.
Doctor without Borders India (DWBI) runs projects in the states of Andhra
Pradesh, Bihar, Chhattisgarh, Delhi, Jammu andKashmir,Jharkhand,Maharashtra,
Manipur, and Telangana. Doctors Without Borders India (DWBI) and the
endTB project
Doctors Without Borders, and its partners i.e. Partners In Health (PIH), Interactive
Research and Development (IRD), Epicentre, France, Institute of Tropical
Medicine, Belgium and the Harvard Medical School have launched two major
clinical trials, endTB and endTB-Q which seek to revolutionize treatment for the
toughest strains of tuberculosis (TB), the worlds leading infectious disease killer.
The goal of these studies is to generate high quality evidence from a highly
heterogeneous population that could lead to a change in the global
recommendations for the management of MDR-TB.
The endTB trials are multi-country, randomized, controlled, Phase III clinical trial
testing five new, all oral, shorter duration regimens compared to the current
standard of care. The aim of the trials is to find shorter, less toxic and injection-
free treatments for multidrug-resistant TB (MDR-TB). The experimental
regimens mainly rely on newly approved or repurposed drugs and avoid drugs to
which high rates of resistance have been reported in MDR-TB patient
populations.These multi-country trials are being conducted in
Georgia, India, Kazakhstan, Lesotho, Pakistan, Peru, South Africa and Vietnam. In
India the trials are conducted at Mumbai and Pune sites by Doctors Without
Borders India (DWBI) in Partnership with ICMR- National AIDS Research Institute
(NARI) and in support with National Tuberculosis Elimination Program (NTEP).
Benefits (Non-negotiable)
Monthly Gross Salary: INR 69,882/- and Secondary Benefits as per policies:
• 13th Month Salary/ Festival Bonus
• 18 Annual Leaves
• 12 Casual Leaves
• Other compassionate leaves
• Medical Reimbursement including dependents
• Personal Accidental Insurance including dependents
Specific skills
• Ability to organize and prioritize workload & taking initiative when
appropriate
• Able to integrate into a multi-cultural team and cooperate with co-workers
• Able to work independently as well as part of a team and ability to cope
with stress.
• Good Punctuality and ability to act with responsibility
• Demonstrates flexibility in taking up tasks outside of regular job
responsibilities as required and aptitude for humanitarian medical work.
• Excellent computer skills (especially MS Office MS Word and MS Excel) &
reporting skills.
• Languages: English, Hindi & Marathi.
Qualification-
• Desirable degree (or masters) in Medicine, Pharmacy or Health Sciences
with Diploma in Clinical Research.
• Desirable specialization or training in tropical diseases Main Tasks & Responsibilities
Accountabilities :
• With the support of the Desk Epidemiologist, creating, reviewing and adapting data collection tools according to
the project indicators and coordinating the development, implementation and follow up of Standard Operating
Procedures (SOPs) for documentation. Developing and implementing data quality assurance methods to ensure
good performance of the activities and reliability of the information, treating with respect and confidentiality all
patient information.
• Providing technical support to the medical team and data entry staff in the implementation of routine data
recording, collection and entry for the selected project indicators in clinics and/or hospitals and/or health centers.
Organizing and implementing or providing technical support in the establishment of monitoring tools for new
activities as initiated in the project.
• On a monthly, quarterly or basis of request, implementing detail analysis of recorder data for key indicators forthe
project in order to facilitate the definition, redefinition or reorientation of project activity. This will also include
analysis of the district’s (MoH) cohort data, whenever available. Following the analysis, identifying and reporting
any new and interesting indicators for review with the medical team for potential follow up where relevant.
• Managing and supervising the work of the data team personnel for quality assurance including identification of
training needs and providing coaching for the staff on issues related to data
• Planning and supervising, with support of the HR department, the associated HR processes (recruitment,
training/induction, evaluation, potential detection, motivation,developmentandinternalcommunication) the data
team in order to ensure having the appropriate team in terms of size, capabilities and skills.
• Participating in meetings and/or trainings as requested scheduled by manager or MSF. This includes but is not
limited to MSF internal meetings and/or trainings, and local, regional, or international meetings and/or trainings
• On a monthly basis and in collaboration with the medical team, preparing and submitting summary reports on
analysed data for both MoH and MSF and preparing and implementing MSF internal monthly or quarterly medical
data presentation, including facilitation of team reflection and sharing of updates to promote teamdynamismand
reactivity.
• Performing additional activities whenever needed and as requested by the supervisor
DWBI Section/Context Specific Accountabilities
• In collaboration with the Sponsor and the Operational Research Coordinator, define QualityAssurance and Quality
Control activities on site
• Review all trial documents to ensure they align with the latest version of the protocol and GCP
• Submission of monthly reports to the Sponsor and the Operational Study Coordinator along with analysis
• Follow up of implementation of all the Corrective Action and preventive Actions identified.
• Undergo training in the protocol, trial procedures, and GCP
• Review the Investigator Site File for the essential documents, regulatory and ethic committee sectionto ensure the
documents archiving completeness and submissions of protocol and protocol amendments, patients’ materials,
safety information and deviations are performed as per ICH-GCP, Indian GCP, Sponsor and local requirements
• Review in collaboration with the Sponsor and the Operational Researchcoordinator the Worksheets andotherlocal
trial documents to ensure process consistency and adequacy of processes andinstruments usedfordata collection.
• Ensure that the versions in use of study protocol, informed consent forms, guidelines, SOP, worksheets and any
other study related document are updated and that the staff is adequately trained on the latest versions.
• Review participants’ clinical files, and perform Quality Assurance (QA) and Quality Control (QC) according to
parameters as indicated in the Site Quality Management Plan and specific SOPs. In specific, review participants’
patients’ files to verify that patient care, safety reporting, drugs prescription andadministrationanddata collection
are performed according to locally established procedures and study protocol/SOPs/guidelines.
• Review drug accountability documentation, pharmacy participants’ files and temperature/Humidity monitoring
records to ensure drugs are adequately received, stored and dispensed to the patients. Ensure that accountability
of returned/expired drugs is managed appropriately and unused drugs are destroyed as per local requirements.
• Ensure quality of the data transmitted to the Sponsor is of a high standard (i.e. performing QCinsource documents
and source data verification in data entered in designated data tool).
• Provide technical support to the field team and data entry staff in the implementation of routine qualityassurance
data recording, collection and entry for the selected indicators in the study sites. Organizing and implementing
technical support in the establishment of monitoring tools for quality assurance activities.
• On a monthly, quarterly or basis of request, implement detailed analysis and report of recorded data in order to
facilitate the definition, redefinition or reorientation of quality of patient support and care including data
management. In particular identify corrective actions and preventive actions and follow-up on their
implementation.
• Verify that the Informed Consent Forms are complete, dated ,and signed by the study personnel who obtained
informed consent and the patient, and, if applicable, the parent, guardian, or legal representative.
• Verify that consent withdrawals have been properly documented
• Review and monitor the Investigator Site File and Central Investigator File regularly for content and completeness.
• Verify responses provided to data queries generated by the central Data Management team and by the external
monitor are accurate
• Support the external monitor during the monitoring visits
• Support the Operational Research Coordinator with review of submissions to Indian ERB andregulatoryauthorities
• Assist with additional tasks as agreed upon with study management
• Attend regular meetings with the endTB trial team.
• Attend meetings related to the endTB trial, including at MSF, clinical, academic, and community forum.
Duration – 12 Months (Renewable)
Location: Mumbai
Expected Start Date: 1 December 2020. STTo apply please email your CV and motivation letter with the subject Ref: “Internal Monitor”
To: msfocb-mumbai@brussels.msf.org by 19th November 2020 5:00 pm.
ONLY SHORT-LISTED CANDIDATES WILL BE CONTACTED AND INVITED FOR INTERVIEW. www.msfindia.in

Description:
JOB SUMMARY:
Mindbody is looking for a Sr Financial Analyst passionate about data and visualizations to assist with reporting to our executive leadership team. The role involves maintaining and optimizing the Finance team?s data integrations and building reports and dashboards for data driven decision making. The successful candidate must have relevant experience with ERP, financial planning, and data visualization tools. The role requires close collaboration with the data sciences team and familiarity with data management principles.
MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS & REQUIREMENTS:
Bachelor?s degree in Business or Finance
5 years? experience in finance/accounting, preferably in a SaaS or tech company
3 years? experience with data visualization tools such as Power BI, Tableau, or Looker
Data management involvement and familiarity
Experience with a tier 1 or tier 2 ERP system (NetSuite is a plus)
Experience with an enterprise financial planning tool strongly preferred (Adaptive Insights is a plus)
Outstanding written communication skills
Excellent visual design skills, strong attention to detail and quality, highly organized
PRINCIPAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:
Provide reports and data visualizations to the executive leadership team for data driven decision making
Maintain and optimize data integration between ERP system (NetSuite) and our financial planning tool (Adaptive Insights)
Support the design and build of an integration between Adaptive Insights and the enterprise data warehouse
Support company wide data governance and automation efforts
Perform ad hoc financial analysis as needed and take on assigned strategic initiatives
All other duties as assigned
SCOPE OF SUPERVISION/AUTHORITY:
Duties for this position are performed under limited supervision
You will be responsible for planning and organizing their own work, which may or may not be directly related to general business operations of the company or its customers
You will receive training and guidance from manager as needed
Individual contributors may be required to regularly exercise discretion and independent judgment with respect to matters of significance depending on the nature of the position
There is no direct management responsibility for the position
WORK ENVIRONMENT AND PHYSICAL DEMANDS:
Dexterity of hands and fingers to operate a computer keyboard.
This position is mostly stationary and will be required to remain stationary for extended periods of time
Specific vision abilities required by this position include close vision, color vision, and the ability to adjust focus
The noise level in the work environment is usually moderately quiet

Description:
We are inviting applications for the role of Data Engineer with Python

This Role includes writing and testing code, debugging programs and integrating applications with third-party web services. To be successful in this role, you should have experience using server-side logic and work well in a team

Responsibilities

To support in the marketing campaign execution journey for a leading firm to migrate and execute campaigns from leading marketing automation platform to custom build Notebook in Python
Strong technical and marketing domain acumen to understand marketing strategies and convert it into Python codes. Expert knowledge of Python Coding. Should be aware of the end to end SDLC process in python world
Develop ETL pipelines to move data from source systems (CRM, weblogs, etc.) into data lake (HDFS, S3 etc.)
Deep experience in developing data processing tasks using PySpark such as reading data from external sources, merge data, perform data enrichment and load in to target data destinations.
Perform data manipulation, wrangling, cleansing, and analysis and be responsible for the complex and large-scale datasets to be used for statistical modeling and data mining.
Build complex multi-channel marketing campaigns based on business requirement
Develop processes for data preparations, modelling and mining & discover opportunities for data acquisitions
Must be proficient with tools such as Anaconda, Apache HTTP server, etc.
Excellent knowledge of various statistical techniques and proven skill in statistical modeling (Regression, Logistic Regression, Time series, Clustering, CHAID/Classification trees Etc.)- good to have
Ability to extract and manipulate data from multiple, complex data sources with a high degree of accuracy
Knowledge of relational databases (preferably MS SQL Server 2008 and above), with experience writing SQL queries and stored procedures. SQL profiler experience is desirable.
Should know and understand both Supervised & Unsupervised Machine Learning algorithms and have applied them in industry scenario on at least 1 implementations
Should have good amount of data analysis experience and know about various exploratory techniques
Very good communication skills; must be able to gather requirements from potential users and discuss the requirements effectively with a technical team of developers

Qualifications we seek in you
Minimum qualifications

Graduate/ Post Graduate in B.tech/MBA/MCA
Experience in defining the data engineering activities and processes for building the ML models at speed.
Preferred qualifications
Have professional experience of more than 3 years as a Data Engineer / Data Analyst.
A flexible, dedicated and solution orientated approach through periods of change and disruption.
Should possess good interpersonal skills
Innovative and always looking for continuous improvement
Communicate with clients on day-to-day basis to discuss project progress

Description:
The Data Analyst role is a hands on individual contributor responsible for end-to-end design, development deployment of analytics solutions for assigned projects. We are looking for an energetic Analyst with proven record of developing solutions pertinent to identification, analysis and interpretation of patterns from complex data problems. You will be required to work at a client site; our client is a fortune 50 insurance company.
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
Use a variety of data analysis tools to explore our existing datasets to uncover correlations, predictive metrics other insights that uncover the factors that drive growth.
Build, own and manage modelling initiatives to drive marketing campaign results, including to deliver analytics applications for customer targeting, retention and recommendation.
Develop and automate pipelines, dashboards to communicate campaign growth metrics to stakeholders, both regularly and on an ad-hoc basis.
Assist in setting up data architect and synthetic data creation in cloud computing platform for project development and implementation. Collaborate with offshore data engineer to ensure cross-countries data availability and usage.
Present business insights based on data driven findings; Present and illustrate technical details to management.
End to end project management, and model maintenance and documentation.
KEY SKILLS
Degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research or any other quantitative discipline preferred.
1 to 3 years work experience. Determination in working in a high data volume environment. Fresh graduate will also be considered.
Combination of analytical, technical savviness and business acumen. Good understanding of experimental approaches in Marketing Campaigns.
Solid programming skills, using Python, SAS, SQL.
Knowledge in machine learning, deep learning or data architecture.
Experience in Tableau, AWS, Linux, Git or Spark iterate is highly preferred.
Strong track of continuous learning desire and intellectual curiosity.
Strong spoken and written English. Able to interact and negotiate well with management/ developer/ architects/ stakeholders in English dialogue.

The Employer

Our client is a well established, technology-focused B2B loan marketplace and holds a patented technology solution for channel partners. They set out with the objective of making the entire loan process better and transparent with the help of technology and have seen a steady growth since their launch.

The Job

You will be required to analyse the vast number of datasets and provide a meaningful impact and the result of such data with combination of growth of the company to the management. You will be closely communicating with other departments, thus must be someone who really loves his role.

Interpreting data, analysing results using statistical techniques and providing ongoing reports
